attributes.additional_details:
Subsidise all UK outlets that serve fresh fruit and veg based products such as smoothies and salads.

An individual can walk down a street in a major city and get free WiFi but lacks the ability to readily purchase affordable ready-to-eat healthy foods or have open access to tap water.

rejection.details: See 'Heavily subsidise fruit, vegetables, pulses, legumes, cereals, nuts, white meat and fish sourced in the UK'
